messages.message: Wanted to find the command to print the instance type as well when I do `kubectl get node` so I asked ChatGPT :mindblown:

```$ kubectl get node
NAME                                        STATUS     ROLES    AGE     VERSION
ip-10-0-24-239.us-east-2.compute.internal   Ready      <none>   15m     v1.21.14-eks-ba74326
ip-10-0-27-76.us-east-2.compute.internal    Ready      <none>   14m     v1.21.14-eks-ba74326```
```$ kubectl get node -L node.kubernetes.io/instance-type (http://node.kubernetes.io/instance-type)
NAME                                        STATUS     ROLES    AGE     VERSION                INSTANCE-TYPE
ip-10-0-24-239.us-east-2.compute.internal   Ready      <none>   9m29s   v1.21.14-eks-ba74326   m6i.2xlarge
ip-10-0-27-76.us-east-2.compute.internal    Ready      <none>   9m10s   v1.21.14-eks-ba74326   m6i.2xlarge```
